org.springframework.data.gemfire.mapping.annotation

Annotation Type Indexed


  • @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @Documented
public @interface Indexed
    The Indexed annotation is used to index a GemfirePersistentEntity GemfirePersistentProperty, which creates a GemFire/Geode Index on a GemFire/Geode Region.
    Since:
    1.9.0
    See Also:
    AliasFor, IndexType, Region, Index

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String expression
      Expression to index.
      java.lang.String from
      The Apache Geode Region on which the Index is created.
      java.lang.String name
      Name of the Index.
      IndexType type
      Type of Index to create.
      java.lang.String value
      Name of the Index.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        @AliasFor(attribute="name")
public abstract java.lang.String value
        Name of the Index.
        Default:
        ""

      • name

        @AliasFor(attribute="value")
public abstract java.lang.String name
        Name of the Index.
        Default:
        ""

      • expression

        public abstract java.lang.String expression
        Expression to index.
        Default:
        ""

      • from

        public abstract java.lang.String from
        The Apache Geode Region on which the Index is created.
        Default:
        ""

      • type

        public abstract IndexType type
        Type of Index to create. Defaults to IndexType.HASH.
        Default:
        org.springframework.data.gemfire.IndexType.FUNCTIONAL
